name: New Hope
description:
there is always new hope in every difficulty, there is always new hope in every mistake, there is always new hope in every downfall, and there is always new hope in every struggle. God is always with you in your every new hope.

This work is made with a mixture of acrylic, charcoal, leaf gold, glitter on canvas in 2021

digital dimensions : 2694 x 2694 px
